bibl.title: From Work on the Petra Papyri: Arabic on a Greek Ostracon from Roman Egypt and the Name of the Church Father Sozomen.
bibl.note: The names Salamanios, Salamanes, etc. in Greek papyri [including P. Petra Inv. 10 ined.]. - Pp. 174-176: reedition of O. Coll. privées: O. Bresciani (= S.B. VI, 9610), a letter addressed to Salamanes. Second half of the 3rd century. The word olgitta can be explained as the Arabic al-qitta', 'the cucumbers'. <olgitta>
DANIEL Robert W., From Work on the Petra Papyri: Arabic on a Greek Ostracon from Roman Egypt and the Name of the Church Father Sozomen.
